docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: You cannot apply for it. If you get it, you can do whatever you want with it. You will never know exactly why you were chosen. The composer Charles Wuorinen, who was tapped two years ago, called the MacArthur Fellowship prize ''the most civilized award ever invented.''
